welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Amstelveen, known for its beautiful parks, bustling shopping streets, and proximity to Amsterdam. We hope you'll enjoy exploring all that our city has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly European destinations and is the oldest terminal at Schiphol Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly non-Schengen destinations and is the newest terminal at Schiphol Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly intercontinental destinations and is the largest terminal at Schiphol Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport with a simple registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
